ani kisi rakiyawakata wada deshapalanaye athi wisheshathwaya nam eeta piwisima udesa kisidu mulika adhyapanika sudusukamak awashya nowimayi.me ida hasaraihalin ma prayojanayata gath wiwidhakara dushithayan dan kalak thisse uththarithara parlimenthuwa aakramanaya kota siti.wyawasthadayaka sabhawe waraprasada walata muwawi thaman ge aathmarthakami aramunu mudunpath karalanu was thama palithayan amu amuwe pelamin siti.rate nithiya athata gena thama dushana wancha siyalla wasa sudu piruwatayen wasa upasakayin lesa peni sitithi.me dushitha deshapaluwan athara maha parimana mathdrawya welendan da, sorun ha wanchakarayin bahula bawa da prasiddha rahasaki.
